content:
## Last Session
- Tickets completed: AGT-152 (single dashboard), AGT-153 (redirects), AGT-154 (design refresh), AGT-157 (X logo), AGT-155 (Agent Profile v2)
- Commits: 884fd57, f970470, 1caa4b0, e3cbf62, c578f55
- Files changed: app/page.tsx, layout.tsx, next.config.ts, components/dashboard-v2/*

## Current State
- What's deployed: Unified dashboard at /, EVOX COMMAND CENTER, gray-800 design, Agent Profile v2 (SOUL, statusReason, statusSince, current task)
- Known issues: None. Skills and Send message in profile are placeholders.

## Next Session
- Assigned: AGT-155 (Agent Profile v2)
- Blocked by: nothing (AGT-156 done)
- Design system doc to read first: https://linear.app/affitorai/document/evox-design-system-vercelnotion-minimal-0f9015cdcdd9
